title: mcp_config
content: # `fastmcp.utilities.mcp_config` ## Functions ### `mcp_config_to_servers_and_transports` ```python theme={"theme":{"light":"snazzy-light","dark":"dark-plus"}} mcp_config_to_servers_and_transports(config: MCPConfig) -> list[tuple[str, FastMCP[Any], ClientTransport]] ``` A utility function to convert each entry of an MCP Config into a transport and server. ### `mcp_server_type_to_servers_and_transports` ```python theme={"theme":{"light":"snazzy-light","dark":"dark-plus"}} mcp_server_type_to_servers_and_transports(name: str, mcp_server: MCPServerTypes) -> tuple[str, FastMCP[Any], ClientTransport] ``` A utility function to convert each entry of an MCP Config into a transport and server.
